on reading compounds: 熱【ネツ】heat, fever, temperature, zeal, passion, enthusiasm, mania, craze, rage
熱意【ネツイ】zeal, enthusiasm, ardor, ardour
発熱【ハツネツ】generation of heat, (attack of) fever, pyrexia
解熱【ゲネツ】lowering a fever, alleviation of fever
kun reading compounds: 熱い【あつい】hot (thing), passionate (feelings, etc.), ardent, hot (e.g. gaze), hot (e.g. temper), zealous, enthusiastic, fired up, intense, severe, extreme, hot (topic), of interest
熱い暗黒物質【あついあんこくぶっしつ】hot dark matter
